ROW.Instrumentation: 2(2=Picc+Cl).1.3(1=EbCl+AltSx1.2=AltSx2.3=TenSx).BsCl(=BarSx).2(1=Cl4+TenSx2+BsCl*)/3.3.3.1/Perc(2)(Timpani, Crash Cymbals, Suspended Cymbal, Drum Kit).Hrp.2Pno(2=Clste).Guitar/VnA(5).VnB(4).VnC(4).4.4.3 *alt Cl4+TenSx2+BsCl part w/o Bsn1.
ROW.Notes: Johnny Green's name also appears in header; unclear in what position. Separate folder has 8.5x11 copymasters. Spiral-bound copy of score with annotations from MF stored next to parts folder.
ROW.Title: High Society Overture (Appendix 1)
